title: [LFM] Dark Vengeance looking for a GOLD+ TOP LANE.
body:
**__EDIT:__** **Thanks all that showed interest! We've now got a top laner.**

Hey there! Dark Vengeance looking for a Gold+ Top lane player to play in my team!
There are a few requirements, so here's a list!
_**
- Working Microphone
- Well mannered
- Have Discord for voice communications
- Available to play around 4 (or more) days a week (generally afternoons)
- Decent sized champion pool (we can expand and/or play around it as needed)
- Live in W.A.
_**
We've been playing together for a few weeks now and so far we're all good friends, and we all give each other tips on how to improve on solo play to support the team.
We generally play in tournaments at [RFLan](http://www.rflan.org/), But once we're confident enough we can try for some [OOL](https://battlefy.com/riot-games-oceanic-open-ladder) games!

Looking forward to meeting you, and playing with you on the rift!

Please reply on this thread if you're interested!

Thanks all!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Hey guys im interested in the top lane role am currently gold 3 i think we vsed each other at rflan i was part of the team bloodthirsty vultures

If the position is still open id be glad to join

I'm in platinum and is interested in the position.
(Disclaimer: I haven't been playing for awhile and was a adc main.)
